translations: 喘息；喘息地说（wheeze 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He was coughing and wheezing all night.
It stood there on buckled wheels, wheezing and gasping with exhaustion from having to climb up the gentle slope to the camp, and I consigned myself and my loads to it with some fear.
sentences.translation: 它停在弯曲的轮子上，由于要爬上那平缓的斜坡到营地，累得喘不过气来，我带着几分担心，把自己和行李托付给它。

sentences.sentence: A barrel-organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.translation: 一架手摇风琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子。
